channel.title: Lynn Blog
channel.description: The blog of a Queer, Feminist, Programmer - Lynn Cyrin

item.title: Community Health
item.description: Build a better internet! Be aware of your community's health

item.title: Intern Problems
item.description: Detailing the exciting life of an intern working on projects whose scope will always and forever be over her head (but that's ok!)

item.title: Lynn has a Danger Fetish
item.description: I just... lol I don't even know what to say. Read this fucking story.

item.title: About Life
item.description: The dramatic amount of stress I deal with made me realize a few things. ((TW: Death, Suicide))

item.title: "Homelessness"
item.description: People really don't understand what it means to be homeless, so please let me explain it to you

item.title: Deconstruction: San Francisco's *Visible Class War
item.description: Good idea, bad writes. Let's pull out the red pen!

item.title: The BAdvocate Mag
item.description: Rainbow is not the new black, white people please sit the fuck down.

item.title: Origin Story
item.description: Detailing the exciting and dynamic origin of your cutest protagonist. Code is written, home is un-lessed, destiny is acquired.

item.title: Outdoor Adventure
item.description: Brave adventress Lynn goes on a daring mission behind enemy lines

item.title: Community Health Tracker
item.description: Know when your friends are happy, sad, sleeping or awa... wait no. Just happy and sad!

item.title: Countdown to Liftoff
item.description: Sometimes the hardest part of the trip is getting off the ground in the first place. Especially when the ground is hella racist.
